updates

⚇ noisy spaces at ANNEX by the koppel project ( January 2026 ) ⚇

I led a performance lecture for Phreaking Collectives show does cloud compute (ever) precipitate at ANNEX by The Koppel Project!


⚇ low stakes high spirits ( December 2025 ) ⚇

Agnes and I performed a radio live set at St Giles Crypt Camberwell, as part of Low Stakes High Spirits! Thank you so much to the organisers and everyone who came!


⚇ noisy spaces at ucl slade ( November 2025 ) ⚇

I gave a lecture to UCL Slades Art & Technology and Mixed Media BA pathways, looking at noisy spaces, my practice and creative applications of mundane technology. I presented via figma board.
